        public static java.security.Key[] getKeys()
        Generates RSA keys
        Returns:
        key list (key[0] = public key, key[1] = private key)

      • encryptWithPrivate

        public static byte[] encryptWithPrivate(byte[] key,
                                        byte[] input)
        Encrypts a plaintext by using the private key
        Parameters:
        key - is the private key to use
        input - is the plaintext to encrypt
        Returns:
        cipher text (= plaintext encrypted with the private key)

      • encrypt

        public static byte[] encrypt(byte[] pKey,
                             byte[] input)
        Encrypts a given byte array with a given public key
        Parameters:
        pubKey - the public key
        input - the bytes to encrypt
        Returns:
        the RSA-2048 encryption of the input in a byte array

      • decrypt

        public static byte[] decrypt(byte[] privKey,
                             byte[] input)
        Decrypts an given cipher byte array with a given private key
        Parameters:
        privateKey - the private key
        input - the cipher byte array
        Returns:
        a decrypted byte array of the input

      • decryptWithPublic

        public static byte[] decryptWithPublic(byte[] key,
                                       byte[] input)
        Decrypts the ciphertext by using the public key
        Parameters:
        key - is the public key
        input - is the ciphertext to decrypt
        Returns:
        the plaintext (= ciphertext decrypted with the public key)
